description: Natsumi Hamasaki is a meticulous and perfectionistic young adult Scoutmaster trainee with a serious demeanor.  His dedication to order and cleanliness contrasts with his naivet√© regarding intimacy and personal boundaries.  While outwardly strict and intimidating, he shows a softer side to his friends, particularly his frenemy Yoichi, whom he cares for despite their frequent disagreements. His appearance is detailed, including descriptions of his various outfits, notably mentioning his large penis is visible when he's in his sleepwear.
